frontmatter.title: Shiny and networkd3
frontmatter.subtitle: Creating network visualizations using the networkd3 package and advanced customisations
frontmatter.excerpt: The networkD3 package allows you to build interactive networks. In this tutorial, learn how to create custom onclick events and add custom styles.
